ingredients: 6 cups peeled, cored, and sliced pears, 1 cup water, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 (2 ounce) package powdered fruit pectin, 8 cups white sugar,   +   1/2 cup brown sugar, 2 teaspoons ground allspice, 2 teaspoons ground nutmeg
